name: STUDENTA_SCHOOL_INFO
description: Table containing the Studenta school info items in related group 82150.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCHOOL_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: The history of schools this patient attended. This data is received from Studenta.

columns.name: DEGREE_C_NAME
columns.description: The history of degrees a patient had. This data is received from Studenta.

columns.name: START_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: The history of start groups a patient was in. This data is received from Studenta.

columns.name: DEGREE_START_DATE
columns.description: The history of start dates of degrees a patient had. This data is received from Studenta.

columns.name: STDENTA_VAL_FRM_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The history of start dates for a patient's school information. This data is received from Studenta.

columns.name: STDENTA_VAL_TO_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The history of end dates for a patient's school information. This data is received from Studenta.
